function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of self-isolation when showing COVID-19-like symptoms","Impact":"Increased transmission of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Encouraging self-isolation through strong recommendations and laws, and implementing nationwide testing programs","Technologies":"Testing and diagnostic technologies, communication technologies for public awareness","People":"General public, individuals with COVID-19-like symptoms","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Large public events with more than 100 participants","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission in crowded settings","Mitigation":"Banning all public events with more than 100 participants","Technologies":"Enforcement technologies for crowd control","People":"Event organizers, participants, general public","Owner":"Government, event organizers, law enforcement agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of social distancing and non-essential contact","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission","Mitigation":"Encouraging social distancing, working from home, and reducing use of public transport","Technologies":"Communication technologies for public awareness, remote work technologies","People":"General public, public transport users, employers, employees","Owner":"Government, employers, public transport authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of lockdown measures and restrictions on social interaction","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission in community settings","Mitigation":"Implementing strict regulations on public gatherings, closure of institutions, and stay-at-home orders","Technologies":"Enforcement technologies, communication technologies for public awareness","People":"General public, students, employees, public institutions","Owner":"Government, law enforcement agencies, public institutions"}]}
